text:
Hey Sophie!
nice and bright lighting.
could you look into rendering passes for compositing
1. shadow pass(all white screen with shadows on the ground), no ship
2. ship with alpha on black(can be single layer or broken into multiple passes e.g. specular)
3. if you are using more than one light each light can be a layer.

there is no specific right way. we are looking for flexibility so we can making quick changes without re-rendering.

look into maya render layers or/and render settings that allows you to do it easily.

once you get the hang of it.
it will be fast and your stuff will look great
let me know what you come up with and any questions and weâ€™ll try to comp this into the background
